S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-616
backporting fix for DERBY-616 (svn 384282) from trunk into 10.1 branch, targeted for upcoming 10.1.3 release.
original notes for fix:
o Added a missing privileged blocks for I/O call in StreamFileContainer.java , this class is used by the sort during index creation ..etc.
o Enabled some of the tests which were not running under security manager earlier because of this bug to run by default with security manager.
o removed the additional permissions from the derby test policy file that were added earlier to avoid this bug for some test cases.
